anthimata menna gunadasa kapuge ge klasik ekak.oba pem karana - gunadasa kapugepada rachanaya -oba pem karana obe kumari obata aadareyi kiyana wilasinpera dawasaka ma pem karana sanda mata da aadareyi kiya thibeoba pem karana obe kumari mata da aadareyi kiya thibesagara werale sonduru sandawaka rangahala kelawara anduru nimeshekaada oba langa oba sanasalana aya pera dawasaka ma thurulata wi indamatada aadareyi kiya thibeoba pem karana obe kumariya matada aadareyi kiya thibesakman maluwaka depa geweddi dodamalu pembas goluwi yaddima samugena oba wethata pamini aya sanahasa sangawa denetha nurawenmatada aadareyi kiya thibeoba pem karana obe kumari matada aadareyi kiya thibemenna yu tiyub klip eka.

yuddhaya nisa boho de winasha wuwata aaraksha wu deda thibe.ada eese aaraksha wu saththwa wisheshayak ganayi.lankawa goda wesena wishalama sathunata menma diye wasana wishalama sathatath prasiddayi.goda wesenne aliya, diye wesenne nil thalmaha.nil thalmahage hrudaya wasthuwa kuda karayak tharam we.owunage wishalathwaya sitha ganimata honda sasandimak.yuddhayata doskiwata yuddhaya nisa apata aaraksha wu sampathaki.

atham awasthawaladi swabhawayen sitha sansindi athiwita sithata pahalawana sithiwiliwala etharam wegawath bawak daknata natha.manasa sahalluwata pathkarawanne mebandu mandagami swabhawaye sithiwiliya.mebandu sithiwili kesewath chiththawega lesa manasehi athinowima manasata suwadayi bawak ha sahalluwak genadimata samathwe.samanyayen kushala pakshika sithiwili lesa salakena siyalu chiththa kriyakari thathwayanma mema kandayata ayathya.alobha,adosa ha amoha yana mulika aramunu thrithwaya padanamkaraganiminma mebandu chiththa swabhawayan hataganiyi.
